xtft_g.c File Reference

Detailed Description

This file contains a configuration table that specifies the parameters of TFT devices.

 MODIFICATION HISTORY:

 Ver    Who   Date      Changes
 -----  ----  --------  -----------------------------------------------
 1.00a  sg    03/24/08  First release
 4.00a  bss   01/25/13  Removed the XPAR_TFT_0_DCR_SPLB_SLAVE_IF and
			 XPAR_TFT_0_DCR_BASEADDR as AXI TFT controller
			 doesnot support them

#include "xtft.h"
#include "xparameters.h"

Variables

XTft_Config XTft_ConfigTable []

Variable Documentation

XTft_Config XTft_ConfigTable[]
 

Initial value:

{
        {
                XPAR_TFT_0_DEVICE_ID,
                XPAR_TFT_0_BASEADDR,
                XPAR_TFT_0_DEFAULT_TFT_BASE_ADDR
        }
}
The configuration table for TFT devices in the table. Each device should have an entry in this table.
